tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GenomicData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  chromosome VARCHAR(10),
  position INT,
  gene_name VARCHAR(50),
  mutation_type VARCHAR(20),
  dna_sequence TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE genes (
    gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    chromosome VARCHAR(5) NOT NULL,
    start_position INT NOT NULL,
    end_position INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE variants (
    variant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_id INT REFERENCES genes(gene_id),
    variant_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    variant_type VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    frequency FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Genes (
    gene_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    chromosome VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    gene_start INT NOT NULL,
    gene_end INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Variants (
    variant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_id INT REFERENCES Genes(gene_id),
    variant_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    variant_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    variant_position INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Samples (
    sample_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    variant_id INT REFERENCES Variants(variant_id),
    sample_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    sample_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    sample_data JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE gene_variants (
    variant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_name VARCHAR(255),
    variant_type VARCHAR(50),
    effect VARCHAR(50),
    impact_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE patient_genotypes (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sequence_id INT,
    variant_id INT,
    genotype VARCHAR(10),
    FOREIGN KEY (sequence_id) REFERENCES genetic_sequences(sequence_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (variant_id) REFERENCES gene_variants(variant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE research_studies (
    study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    study_name VARCHAR(255),
    lead_researcher VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);
